document_data.name: Locci
document_data.mainbody: '''Locci''' was one of the twelve moons of [[Garden]] in [[Realmspace]].
document_data.Description: Locci was an odd celestial object shaped like a rectangle {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} wide and {{SI|300|ft|long=yes}} long. The tiny moon had no atmosphere and had been nicked by [[meteor]]s and comets over its history.
